dt.patient:
SELECT
	DATA ->> 'id'	AS	"patient_identifier_value"
FROM
	resources
WHERE
  type = 'Patient'
ORDER BY
	data ->> 'id';
dt.gender:
SELECT
	DATA ->> 'gender'	AS	"patient_gender",
DATA ->> 'id'	AS	"patient_identifier_value"
FROM
	resources
WHERE
  type = 'Patient'
ORDER BY
	data ->> 'id';
dt.zipcode:
SELECT
	DATA ->> 'id'	AS	"patient_identifier_value",
DATA -> 'address' -> 0 ->> 'postalCode'	AS	"patient_address_postalCode"
FROM
	resources
WHERE
  type = 'Patient'
ORDER BY
	data ->> 'id';
dt.birthdate:
SELECT
	DATA ->> 'birthDate'	AS	"patient_birthDate",
DATA ->> 'id'	AS	"patient_identifier_value"
FROM
	resources
WHERE
  type = 'Patient'
ORDER BY
	data ->> 'id';
dt.encounter:
SELECT
	REPLACE(DATA ->> 'id', 'Patient/', '')	AS	"encounter_identifier_value",
REPLACE(DATA -> 'subject' ->> 'reference', 'Patient/', '')	AS	"encounter_subject_patient_identifier_value"
FROM
	resources
WHERE
  type = 'Encounter';
dt.encounterstart:
SELECT
  DATA ->> 'id'	AS	"encounter_identifier_value",
  TO_DATE(DATA -> 'period' ->> 'start', 'YYYY-MM-DD')	AS	"encounter_period_start"
FROM
	resources
WHERE
  type = 'Encounter'
ORDER BY
  DATA ->>'id';
dt.encounterend:
SELECT
  DATA ->> 'id'	AS	"encounter_identifier_value",
  TO_DATE(DATA -> 'period' ->> 'end', 'YYYY-MM-DD')	AS	"encounter_period_end"
FROM
	resources
WHERE
  type = 'Encounter'
ORDER BY
  DATA ->>'id';
dt.condition:
SELECT
  REPLACE(DATA -> 'encounter' ->> 'reference', 'Encounter/', '')	AS	"condition_encounter_identifier_value",
  DATA -> 'code' -> 'coding' -> 0 ->> 'code'	AS	"condition_code_coding_code"
FROM
	resources
WHERE
  type = 'Condition';
